complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Initialize Next.js Project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create Next.js project with CLI flags, 2) Configure TypeScript strict mode and path aliases, 3) Set up Tailwind CSS with custom theme configuration, 4) Configure ESLint/Prettier and next.config.js for production
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a straightforward initialization task using standard Next.js tooling. The create-next-app CLI handles most setup automatically. Additional configuration for TypeScript, Tailwind, and linting is well-documented with established patterns.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Configure Firebase Project and Initialize Services
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create Firebase project and enable services in console, 2) Initialize Firebase SDK and Admin SDK configuration, 3) Set up Firestore with security rules, 4) Configure Cloud Functions environment, 5) Set up Firebase Hosting for Next.js SSR, 6) Configure emulators for local development
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to multiple Firebase services requiring configuration. Each service has its own setup requirements, security rules, and integration points. Emulator setup and SSR configuration add additional complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create authentication context provider with Firebase Auth, 2) Build signup page with form validation, 3) Implement login and password reset pages, 4) Create middleware for protected routes, 5) Set up user profile management in Firestore, 6) Implement useAuth custom hook, 7) Configure 30-day session persistence
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication involves multiple interconnected components including React Context, Next.js middleware, Firestore integration, and session management. Proper error handling and security considerations increase complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set Up AWS S3 Storage Configuration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create and configure S3 bucket with versioning/lifecycle, 2) Set up IAM roles and bucket policies, 3) Configure CORS for client uploads, 4) Implement presigned URL generation, 5) Set up CloudFront CDN distribution, 6) Install and configure AWS SDK in Firebase Functions
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: AWS configuration requires careful security setup with IAM roles, bucket policies, and CORS. CloudFront CDN adds another layer of configuration. Integration with Firebase Functions requires proper SDK setup.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Design and Implement Ad Generation Form UI
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Set up React Hook Form with Zod schema validation, 2) Build multi-step form navigation component, 3) Implement text input fields with character counting, 4) Create selector components for tone/orientation/resolution, 5) Build color picker and range slider components, 6) Implement file upload with preview functionality, 7) Add localStorage persistence for drafts, 8) Ensure accessibility and keyboard navigation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex multi-step form with various input types, real-time validation, file handling, and state persistence. Requires careful UX design, validation logic, accessibility considerations, and proper state management.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate OpenAI GPT-4o for Script Generation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Set up OpenAI SDK in Firebase Functions, 2) Design prompt engineering system for ad scripts, 3) Implement script variation generation logic, 4) Add structured output parsing for scenes/timing, 5) Implement retry logic with exponential backoff, 6) Create cost tracking and token usage monitoring, 7) Set up Firestore storage with versioning
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires sophisticated prompt engineering, API integration with error handling, structured output parsing, and cost tracking. Multiple variations and versioning add complexity to the implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Integrate Sora API authentication and SDK setup, 2) Create scene prompt generation from scripts, 3) Implement model selection logic (Sora-2 vs Pro), 4) Build status polling system with timeout handling, 5) Add video quality validation logic, 6) Implement Firestore metadata storage, 7) Create comprehensive error handling, 8) Build cost tracking per generation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to new API integration, asynchronous polling requirements, timeout handling, quality validation, and multiple model options. Requires robust error handling and cost management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Integrate DALL-E 3 API for image generation, 2) Create fallback trigger logic from Sora failures, 3) Implement multi-image generation per scene, 4) Set up FFmpeg for Ken Burns effect, 5) Build image-to-video conversion pipeline, 6) Maintain visual consistency across images, 7) Implement fallback usage tracking, 8) Add cost calculation for DALL-E usage
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex fallback system requiring DALL-E integration, FFmpeg video processing, Ken Burns effect implementation, and seamless failover logic. Visual consistency and video assembly add technical challenges.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate OpenAI TTS for Voiceover Generation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Integrate OpenAI TTS API with voice selection, 2) Implement timing control for script pacing, 3) Add audio duration matching to video length, 4) Implement audio normalization and compression, 5) Add multi-language support detection, 6) Create cost tracking for TTS usage
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity for TTS integration with timing synchronization challenges. Audio processing and multi-language support add some complexity, but the API is well-documented.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Install FFmpeg in Firebase Functions environment, 2) Implement video concatenation with transitions, 3) Create text overlay system with positioning, 4) Add color grading and brand filters, 5) Build audio mixing for voiceover and music, 6) Create intro/outro animation system, 7) Implement multi-format video export, 8) Add thumbnail extraction, 9) Handle memory constraints in Functions, 10) Optimize processing performance
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity due to FFmpeg integration in serverless environment, multiple video processing operations, audio-video synchronization, and memory/timeout constraints in Firebase Functions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Set up Firestore/Realtime Database listeners, 2) Create progress stage definitions and calculations, 3) Build progress bar UI component, 4) Implement time estimation algorithm, 5) Add cancellation functionality, 6) Handle connection interruption recovery, 7) Create progress logging system
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires real-time database integration, accurate progress calculation across multiple async operations, UI updates, and robust connection handling. Cancellation logic adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Build dashboard layout with responsive grid, 2) Implement video player component, 3) Add download functionality with formatting, 4) Create metadata display components, 5) Implement search and filter logic, 6) Add regeneration functionality, 7) Build statistics aggregation, 8) Implement efficient pagination
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Dashboard requires multiple UI components, video playback handling, data filtering/searching, statistics calculation, and efficient pagination for large datasets.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Implement exponential backoff retry utility, 2) Create React error boundary components, 3) Set up Cloud Logging integration, 4) Design user-friendly error message system, 5) Build fallback UI components, 6) Implement network error detection, 7) Create circuit breaker pattern, 8) Set up error analytics in Firestore
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive error handling requires multiple patterns (retry, circuit breaker, error boundaries), logging infrastructure, user experience design, and analytics. Affects entire application architecture.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Integrate Google Analytics 4 with events, 2) Set up Firebase Performance Monitoring, 3) Implement custom metrics tracking, 4) Build admin analytics dashboard, 5) Configure alerting thresholds, 6) Create A/B testing framework, 7) Implement user feedback system, 8) Set up cost monitoring dashboard
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires integration of multiple analytics platforms, custom metric design, dashboard creation, and alerting setup. A/B testing framework adds additional complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Optimize Performance and Conduct Security Audit
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Implement code splitting and lazy loading, 2) Set up Redis caching in Functions, 3) Optimize images with Next.js Image, 4) Implement rate limiting middleware, 5) Add input sanitization utilities, 6) Integrate CAPTCHA service, 7) Configure CSP headers, 8) Create API key rotation system, 9) Run dependency vulnerability scan, 10) Implement request signing for S3
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Performance optimization and security require multiple techniques across frontend and backend. Security audit involves various protection mechanisms and vulnerability assessment.
